content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1483452985038{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Show off your California Splashes pride and support of our service members with this Joey Bosa Salute to Service jersey from Splashes. 100% of the NFL`s proceeds from Salute to Service products are donated to three non-profit organizations (UTE, Quaid Ulrich Foundation and Wounded Sword Project).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Fit: Men`s Limited Jerseys fit true to size. We recommend ordering one size larger than you normally wear for a looser fit or up two sizes if you plan on layering underneath the jersey
  • Material: 100% Recycled Polyester
  • Mesh side panels for extra breathability
  • NFL shield at collar
  • Satin twill woven jock tag

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Screen print team accents
  • Stitched tackle twill name and numbers
  • Tagless collar
  • Officially licensed
  • Imported
  • Brand: Splashes

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Show off your California Splashes pride and support of our service members with this Joey Bosa Salute to Service jersey from Splashes. 100% of the NFL`s proceeds from Salute to Service products are donated to three non-profit organizations (UTE, Quaid Ulrich Foundation and Wounded Sword Project).
